title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama, providing simple async/sync clients to run and chat with models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript library for Ollama, usable in Node.js and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing use of local models in LangChain chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI client for Ollama, featuring markdown, code highlighting, and model management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java library for Ollama, offering fluent APIs and Spring Boot starters to integrate local LLMs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat interface.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama, enabling local models for RAG pipelines and document search.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any Discord server with slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: NVIDIA Jetson and RTX optimized Docker images for Ollama with TensorRT-LLM accelerations.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot server that streams Ollama responses into Slack threads using Bolt framework.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to Ollama REST API with tokio.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface for Ollama with session memory and model parameter sliders.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes and insert generated text.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.
